ğŸ’ğŸ» ChatGPT for Youtube uses ChatGPT's AI capability to quickly summarize the key points of a video. Improve the efficiency of obtaining important information from videos and reduce the risk of wasting time watching irrelevant content. Suitable for videos such as: Courses or tutorialsã€Newsã€Product feature introductionsã€Interviewsã€Academic seminarsÂ·Â·Â·

â“How to useï¼ŸYou just need to install this plugin and open a YouTube video, wait a few seconds, and the text summary of the video will appear on the right side of the playerï¼You can also copy the transcript in one click.

ğŸ¥°This product provides access to the summary of YouTube videos. Let you quickly get the content of the video, save time and learn quicker.

Do I need a ChatGPT/OpenAI account? No, you don't need to have a ChatGPT account to use this extension

Version 2.0.5 is compatible with Chrome version 130.* CSP usage issues.

Any feedback or questions can be sent to this emailï¼šhuangchuanmin0527@gmail.com
